name: Enterprise Rent A Car UK, Ltd.
goal: Enterprise Rent-A-Car UK, Ltd. is the wholly owned subsidiary of Enterprise Holdings, Inc. which owns and operates the Enterprise Rent-A-Car, National Car Rental, and Alamo Rent A Car brands across the globe.  Enterprise intends to engage in government affairs activities in the European Union with the goal of ensuring our company's continued ability to provide opportunities for our employees and valued services for our customers across Europe.  We aim to add value to the policy making process by engaging in those areas that impact our employees and customers.  As an industry leader, we believe our engagement in the shaping of EU policy will benefit consumers across Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Taxation, Transport
euInitiatives: Enterprise has business interests across a broad range of policy areas, including but not limited to:  Transportation; Consumer Law; Competition; Digital Single Market; Employment Law; and Insurance.  Initiatives currently being followed include:  Cross-border vehicle registration; the public consultation and forthcoming initiative on the regulatory environment for platforms, online intermediaries, data and cloud computing and the collaborative economy; Road Package; Package Travel Directive; EU Data Protection Package; Safe Harbour framework; and e-Privacy Directive revisions.
